name: sgladstone/com.pogstone.fancytokens
description: Additional tokens for contribution pages, upcoming event lists, individual event registration pages, and stand-alone CiviCRM profiles. If Drupal WebForm is in use, then any webforms that use CiviCRM integration will also be available as a token.  All hyperlinks include the recipient checksum as appropriate. To see the additional tokens, start composing an email and click 'insert tokens'.
